Reviews.Title: Muy descontenta/  dissatisfied
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: hello good afternoon, before buying the phone asks you several times if it was GSM and you said yes, it now send me a CDMA, and here in Venezuela does not serve to place the line, unfortunately I lost my money. Nuy'm disappointed for the purchase, trust what they told me it was a GSM.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY FROM THIS SELLER!
Reviews.Author: daedae
Reviews.Content: When I got the blackberry and went to Sprint to activate it, they said it was already active meaning it's a bad DEC therefore you cant use it.

Reviews.Title: Factory sealed-don't think so......
Reviews.Author: unhappy blackberry owner
Reviews.Content: The review said that the product was almost brand new. When I got the product, the seller did not take their number off of the phone so I went through three hours of clearing the phone out with the Sprint representative. Not even a few days later I found out the battery does not last, it will go from a fully charged phone to a dead phone in five minutes. I definitely would have liked to know this before I bought a $70 phone that was worth $20. When it said factory sealed, it was not, it was simply wrapped in some bubble wrap.

Reviews.Title: great looking screen but scratches easily
Reviews.Author: JMReview
Reviews.Content: The screen colors are bright and sharp.Make sure to apply a screen protector when you get the phone.  The screen scratches very easily.ZAGG's invisibleSHIELD is pretty good.

Reviews.Title: fraud don't buy it
Reviews.Author: ligia
Reviews.Content: This product was offered with GSM technology and is a lie, then sends a different product with CDMA technology, this is a problem

Reviews.Title: pretty good one
Reviews.Author: d maul
Reviews.Content: I tried two phones before this one. Two LG phones. And just had no luck. Even with this one, it was difficult to set up. But I persevered, and found information online that said to take the battery out for 30 seconds, and that would make it reboot. It worked. I was having really bad reception and dropped calls, but it has cleared out now. I used to run out of battery service before the end of the day, but now is doing fine, and my calls are not being interrupted and disconnected.

Reviews.Title: el telefono no es gsm
Reviews.Author: yessi
Reviews.Content: En la compra salia como desbloqueado y me llego un cdma que por queria es esto, debeia decir lo antes de comprar ya que vende algo que no es

Reviews.Title: worst phone ever
Reviews.Author: ramirez90
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product from this seller and the phone only worked for about 2 days and then it wouldn't charge at all anymore, i took the phone in to the sprint store to see if  they could do anything about the phone and the sales rep told me that the USB port was completely damaged and that was the reason for the phone not being able to charge and even asked me if i would like to give the phone in to have it recycled because it was not repairable.

Reviews.Title: Not GSM
Reviews.Author: Angry bird
Reviews.Content: phone is advertised as GSM but is not so now my Sim Card cannot fit which means i have lost my money cause i cant use this phone

Reviews.Title: help please !
Reviews.Author: najet
Reviews.Content: is it locked ??Can I enter a SIM card in this mobile ,, please answer me as soon as possible , thanks :)

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied.
Reviews.Author: scorpryan
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my order. I love the phone, it came on time, and it came with everything I wanted... except a memory card. That would have been nice. But I wasn't promised one, was I? Overall I am very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: All good
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: Nice price by a good phone... 100% operative. Users from venezuela: recuerden que es CDMA, si no tienen un contacto en movilnet, no podran usarlo ya que tiene que ser por homologacion. Good seller

Reviews.Title: RECIBIDO
Reviews.Author: Adelis Alvarado
Reviews.Content: EXCELENTE VENDEDOR REALIZARE MAS COMPRAS EN EL FUTURO, QUEDE SATISFECHO CON EL PRODUCTO Y HARE RECOMENDACIONES A TODOS LOS AMIGOS

Reviews.Title: different then expectations
Reviews.Author: Alexander
Reviews.Content: I bouth an unlock blackberry but how is that possible when even does not work with SIM card. No memory card eather.

Reviews.Title: Sweet!
Reviews.Author: Eduardo
Reviews.Content: Needed a phone asap and ordered this blackberry for the fiancee. Arrived in 2 days and I had no issues with activation via Sprint.

Reviews.Title: MALISIMO
Reviews.Author: eduardo galindo
Reviews.Content: LE ENVIE NUEVAMENTE EL PRODUCTO PARA QUE ME LO CAMBIARA Y LO QUE HICIERON FUE ROBARME NI ME DEVOLVIERON EL DINERO NI ME ENVIARON EL OTRO CELULAR SON UNOS LADRONES

Reviews.Title: horrible seller experience!
Reviews.Author: Mel the reviewer
Reviews.Content: This was by far my worst Amazon purchase ever (and I order from Amazon about 8 to 10 times per month)!! First of all, the seller Cougarcell sold me a phone stating that it was a Sprint phone. It was not. When I received it I immediately requested a return & refund. The seller then proceeded to argue with me via email about the fact that it was a Sprint phone. I finally had to send them the proof that Sprint phones do not use Sim cards. After 2 days of back and forward emails I receive a return label, return the phone, tracked the return and sent the seller proof of receipt (they received it 2 days after I sent it). I then request a refund. However, After waiting for 6 weeks for the refund and didn't receive it even after sending them the tracking information.  I finally had to contact Amazon for assistance in getting my refund back!Results, I will never purchase anything from Cougarcell ever again, nor can I recommend them to ANYONE!I would suggest to anyone purchasing from any seller other than Amazon themselves that you always return item via a sources that allows you to track your returns on-line, and always keep a copy of that tracking information somewhere you can retrieve it for at least up to 6 weeks after it was sent.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Teresa E. Robinson "teddybear"
Reviews.Content: had to replace my phone.couldn't get an early upgrade so did the next best thing came to amazon. I've never had a blackberry but this phone didn't take long to master and i'm loving it! it was in great condition as the seller advertised.

Reviews.Title: venezolanos no compren este telefono
Reviews.Author: marol
Reviews.Content: es importante que sepan que en venezuela es imposible activar la linea de este telefono, pierden el dinero. porque no trae espacio para colocar ship además para regresarlo usted debe cubrir todos los gastos

Reviews.Title: Fast & Reliable
Reviews.Author: Nathasha Mitchell
Reviews.Content: I received the phone within a good time frame. The phone had no scratches or marks and it was manageable to call my network and switch the service from my previous phone to this one.Had to delete some songs and pics saved on phone but wasn't a big hassle.

Reviews.Title: Replacement phone
Reviews.Author: Adria Rodriguez "breanna627"
Reviews.Content: It was good for a replacement phone and serves the purpose. Although I would recommend getting the next model for better features

Reviews.Title: A Champion
Reviews.Author: D. T. Zewdu
Reviews.Content: This phone is a champion. I bought this after my other phone got ran over by a car (a long & crazy story)and I wanted to upgrade to a smart phone. The phone itself is pricey, but so far, so good. It is working perfectly today like it was when I bought it seven months ago. Its not as fancy as the ipod or droid but it fulfills all the needs for my ideal phone: to call, to text, play games, wifi, and to look smart when I'm using it. If you don't mind paying a few extra dollars then definitely get this phone.

Reviews.Title: Descontinuado
Reviews.Author: Anabelis M
Reviews.Content: Ese teléfono ya esta descontinuado y en Venezuela ni siquiera le colocan la linea, asì que perdí mi dinero, porque igualmente si lo devolvía el costo iba a ser mayor

Reviews.Title: LO PUEDE CAMBIAR
Reviews.Author: PARTIDAS MIRTHA
Reviews.Content: BUENAS TARDES YO COMPRE ESTE ARTICULO Y EN MI PAIS VENEZUELA NO FUNCIONA ESA TECNOLOGIA, NO CONSIGO COM HACER PARA UTILIZAR EL TELEFONO CELULAR, QUISIERA SABER SI ME PUEDEN AYUDAR

Reviews.Title: question
Reviews.Author: Briseida Hernandez
Reviews.Content: Good afternoonI wonder if this phone is CDMA or GSM, I have it in the cart but I really would like to know that Venezuela does not work with CDMA technology

Reviews.Title: blackberry
Reviews.Author: mon
Reviews.Content: the blackberry was a good buy. it came within a week. it is in good, working condition. thank you very much. wasnt sure about amazon but now i really like it.

Reviews.Title: PRODUCTO EQUIVOCADO
Reviews.Author: MARIA
Reviews.Content: ME ENVIARON UN ARTICULO DIFERENTE AL PUBLICADO, COMPRE UN BLACK BERRY 8530 Y ME ENVIARON UN BLACK BERRY 8330. NO ENVIARON LO QUE COMPRE,VOY A HACER DEVOLUCION DEL PRODUCTO

Reviews.Title: Good Phone
Reviews.Author: christineelise
Reviews.Content: good phone, used for work mostly. Emails and BBMs. Dependable, as in battery usage, but Sprint service isn't the greatest.

Reviews.Title: Works great, when you can see it
Reviews.Author: Greg M. Jones "Vegas Diogenes"
Reviews.Content: Bought this back in February after my Treo died. Had to have a leaky LCD serviced at the Spring store in July. Since then, the amount of dust that gathers behind the LCD protective lens cover is so great that depending on the angle that light hits it, I can't see my phone. Sprint advises against carrying the phone in a pocket to prevent this issue. Although hyperbolic, it is similar to Ford suggesting not turning your Expedition to keep it from tipping over.Beyond the fact that I can't see the screen during the day when I'm outside, I would say it works pretty well. But you know, other than a few minor instances my understanding is that Mrs. Lincoln enjoyed the play and Mrs. Kennedy enjoyed that top-down ride.

Reviews.Title: 2.5 Stars
Reviews.Author: J. Hallen "Jake Hallen"
Reviews.Content: WARNING! This review is bias and probably unfair, but I could care less, this is my opinion.Okay, I loved this phone when I first got it about a year and a half ago, that said It now SUCKS, and I will tell you why!Well it is common sense that as time progresses so does technology and the better things get right? I am not mad at that.Now what gets me is the lack of apps! I know apps does not make the phone but COME ON! The most interesting app I have is a lame pinball game that only has 1 level! All my other apps are on ATARI level! You have the iPad that can play graphics that look like you are playing a PS3 game! And I am stuck with ATARI! Sorry, but also the apps are expensive as hell! 7.99 for PACMAN....???....................???? HERP DERP! This sucks!No touch screen.Small buttons.Lame apps.Slow 3g.Ugly interface.The trackpad thing was cool, but now its annoying!Mediocre cameraBattery life sucks.The only good thing about this phone is that its sturdy and can be dropped like hell and nothing happens! Oh and also it was only $30 with my upgrade.Blackberry should just give up! Android and iPhones are so much better! I can not wait untill my Evo 3D comes out and until then I hate my phone more and more.

Reviews.Title: THE BEST
Reviews.Author: Brina
Reviews.Content: Omg the best order ever. i recived the package before time.the arival of the phone had enabled me to get my own cel account. thanks TECH10
